snippet: BELL--Gloria, on June 8, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Sidney, cherished sister of Sylvia and Mel Sorcher, adored aunt of Jane Bell, Rob, Michael and Peter Sorcher. Dear stepmother of Dr. Stuart and his family. Also survived by eight great-grandnieces and nephews. Service private. Donations in her memory may be made to Memorial Sloan-Kettering Hospital. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BELL--Gloria, on June 8, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Sidney, cherished sister of Sylvia and Mel Sorcher, adored aunt of Jane Bell, Rob, Michael and Peter Sorcher.
